Success: Reports a successful action, for example:
You have reached your savings goal.

Information: Reports neutral information unrelated to a user action, for example:
Your salary payment has arrived.

Warning: Reports important information unrelated to a user action that may require user action, for example:
Your three-month term deposit matures on March 21, 2020, click here to extend the contract.

Alert: Reports important information that requires immediate user action, for example:
The terms and conditions of the Bank have been changed. You have to agree to them before you can continue using the app.
Alert also reports that an action has failed or resulted in an error, for example:
Your loan application has been rejected.
